title: Implement ID generation in Python
description: Implement ids.py with generate_id(title, timestamp, existing_ids). Use hashlib.sha256, handle collisions with retry, prefix support.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement Python issue ID generation per spec with collision handling and unit tests.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Python ID generation with Pydantic request model, collision handling, and unit tests. Updated pyproject dependencies. make check-python passed.
